i am married and have five children.

my motor never stops running.

content.text: I am John, how about you?
I am Jane, nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! I'm a construction worker, what do you do for a living?
I am a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin.
Wow, that's cool! Do you play any other instruments?
No, I just play the violin. I'm not very good, but I enjoy it.
That's great! I'm not very musical, but I enjoy listening to music.
What's your favorite genre of music?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm really into country music right now.
Oh, that's cool! I like country music too. What's your favorite country artist?
I like a lot of different artists, but my favorite is probably Luke Bryan.
I like Luke Bryan too! He's a great artist.
Yeah, he is! I've seen him in concert a few times and he always puts on a great show.
That's awesome! I've never seen him in concert, but I'd love to see him one day.
You should definitely see him if you get the chance! He's a really talented performer.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It was nice meeting you, Jane.
